actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skull drake makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The skull drake exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious, black gas. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hp by this damage dies.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The skull drake has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the skull drake has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
